songs.title: You Look Like Rain
songs.album: Farm Tour…Here’s to the Farmer - EP
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You and your Sunday mornings
Me and my Saturday nights
You and all your colors
Me and my black and whites
You and your lacing cotton
Up against my whiskey skin
Saving me the way you always do, yeah

[Chorus]
'Cause I'm hell up here on a high wire
You're the hallelujah kind
I'm dust that spins
And the gust of wind
That's blowing by
I'm a desert dry
And in my thirsty eyes
You look like rain

[Verse 2]
You and your stain glass windows
Me and my cracked windshield
You and your quiet beauty
Me and my can't sit still

[Chorus]
'Cause I'm hell up here on a high wire
You're the hallelujah kind
I'm dust that spins
And the gust of wind
That's blowing by
I'm a desert dry
And in my thirsty eyes
You look like rain

[Chorus - 2]
Girl, I'm hell up here on a high wire
You're the hallelujah kind
I'm dust that spins
And the gust of wind
That's blowing by
I'm a desert dry
And in my thirsty eyes
You look like rain

[Outro]
You look like rain
(You look like
You look like
You look like rain)
You look like rain
Ye-yeah
You look like rain
You look like rain
You must be rain...
